categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: An Invitation to Defect is a roleplaying adventure outline in the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game as part of the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. As a sequel to the preceding outline, A Case of Mistaken Identities, the adventure tasks Rebel players with aiding in the defection of a minor bureaucrat from the personal staff of Dandamont Pring, Imperial consul-general of the planet Bothawui. An Invitation to Defect is followed by the adventure A Most Deadly Hunt.
